titles.title: Jesus, You're more than a friend

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the quiet of my soul
In the stillness I hear Your voice call
And I am overwhelmed
And I am lost for words
To describe You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesusm You're more than a friend
And Jesus You're more
Than my heart could ever express
Your love and Your grace never fail me
Your merciful touch always heals me
You bring joy to my soul

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My heart longs to worship You my King
And I long to bring You a pleasing offering
And I am overwhelmed
And I am lost for words
To describe You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I wanna love You more
I wanna know You more
So, reach down and touch me
